activities:
Receive employee data and data related to clinical trials.

The privacy policy is available on the website and in the employee handbook.
address: One Crossroads Drive, Building A, Second Floor
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Finland, France, Germany, Iceland, Italy, Latvia, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: human resources data and clinical data
recoursemech: Data subjects may contact compliance@clinsys.com to register complaints, access requests or address any other issues arising under the Safe Harbor Principles. The EU Data Protection authorities will be available to investigate unresolved complaints that concern HR data. The American Arbitration Association will be available to investigate unresolved complaints that do not concern HR data.
